description: A list of brokers that a client application can use to bootstrap. This list doesn't necessarily include all of the brokers in the cluster. The following Python 3.6 example shows how you can use the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a cluster to get its bootstrap brokers. If you don't know the ARN of your cluster, you can use the ListClusters operation to get the ARNs of all the clusters in this account and Region.

parameters.name: ClusterArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the cluster.

nested_items.name: BootstrapBrokerString
nested_items.description: A string containing one or more hostname:port pairs.

nested_items.name: BootstrapBrokerStringTls
nested_items.description: A string containing one or more DNS names (or IP) and TLS port pairs.

nested_items.name: BootstrapBrokerStringSaslScram
nested_items.description: A string containing one or more DNS names (or IP) and Sasl Scram port pairs.

nested_items.name: BootstrapBrokerStringSaslIam
nested_items.description: A string that contains one or more DNS names (or IP addresses) and SASL IAM port pairs.

nested_items.name: BootstrapBrokerStringPublicTls
nested_items.description: A string containing one or more DNS names (or IP) and TLS port pairs.

nested_items.name: BootstrapBrokerStringPublicSaslScram
nested_items.description: A string containing one or more DNS names (or IP) and Sasl Scram port pairs.

nested_items.name: BootstrapBrokerStringPublicSaslIam
nested_items.description: A string that contains one or more DNS names (or IP addresses) and SASL IAM port pairs.

nested_items.name: BootstrapBrokerStringVpcConnectivityTls
nested_items.description: A string containing one or more DNS names (or IP) and TLS port pairs for VPC connectivity.

nested_items.name: BootstrapBrokerStringVpcConnectivitySaslScram
nested_items.description: A string containing one or more DNS names (or IP) and SASL/SCRAM port pairs for VPC connectivity.

nested_items.name: BootstrapBrokerStringVpcConnectivitySaslIam
nested_items.description: A string containing one or more DNS names (or IP) and SASL/IAM port pairs for VPC connectivity.
